customAppData.title: About Us
customAppData.html_content:
‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÖ ABOUT FU TV ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÖ

üé¨ Welcome to FU TV! üé¨

FU TV is a Vancouver-based online station and website that curates and produces local content. We showcase independent videos, films, music videos, and art made in and around Vancouver.

üíæ

>>> For Creators <<<

Creators keep full ownership, views, and monetization from their work ‚Äî FU TV simply curates and streams it as part of our public playlist. You can submit your own content, watch what others are making in town, and be part of a growing lineup of Vancouver creators.

‚ú® What's Inside? ‚ú®

The station also features mini games, original FU TV productions and upcoming interactive updates designed to make local media fun, weird, and accessible.

‚ù§Ô∏è Made with Love in Vancouver üá®üá¶

üé• üéÆ üé® üéµ

BEST VIEWED AT 1024x768 üñ•Ô∏è

<div class="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-400 via-pink-300 to-yellow-300 p-4">
  <!-- Animated Sparkly Header -->
  <div class="max-w-5xl mx-auto">
    
    <!-- Title Banner with Extreme Y2K Energy -->
    <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 via-yellow-400 to-lime-400 border-8 border-double border-black p-6 mb-6 shadow-2xl transform hover:scale-105 transition-transform">
      <h1 class="text-6xl font-bold text-center text-white drop-shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,0,0,0.8)] animate-pulse">
        ‚≠ê FU TV - FAQ ‚≠ê
      </h1>
      <p class="text-center text-2xl text-black font-bold mt-2 bg-yellow-300 inline-block w-full py-2 border-4 border-black">
        ~~~ FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS ~~~
      </p>
    </div>

    <!-- FAQ Container with Classic Frames -->
    <div class="space-y-4">
      
      <!-- Question 1 -->
      <div class="bg-cyan-200 border-4 border-blue-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-blue-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-red-600 mb-2">
            ‚ùì What is FU TV?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            FU TV is a <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-2 border-2 border-black font-bold">Vancouver-based</span> online tv station (website) that curates and produces local content ‚Äî including shows, music videos, short films, and art made in and around Vancouver.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 2 -->
      <div class="bg-lime-200 border-4 border-green-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-green-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-purple-600 mb-2">
            üë§ Who runs FU TV?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            FU TV is curated by <span class="text-blue-600 font-bold text-xl">James LeBuke</span>. He also works with <span class="bg-pink-300 px-2 border-2 border-black">Faliureunit Productions</span>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 3 -->
      <div class="bg-pink-200 border-4 border-pink-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-pink-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-green-600 mb-2">
            üì§ Can I submit my own content?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-green-600">Yes.</span> Anyone in or connected to Vancouver can submit their work to possibly be featured on FU TV.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 4 -->
      <div class="bg-yellow-200 border-4 border-yellow-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-yellow-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-red-600 mb-2">
            ü§î Will it for sure make it on:
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-red-600">No.</span> but <span class="bg-lime-300 px-2 py-1 border-2 border-black text-xl">maybe</span>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 5 -->
      <div class="bg-orange-200 border-4 border-orange-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-orange-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-600 mb-2">
            üé¨ What kind of content do you feature?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-purple-600 font-bold">Everything</span> with a focus on <span class="bg-pink-300 px-1 border border-black">creative</span>, <span class="bg-cyan-300 px-1 border border-black">original</span>, and <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-1 border border-black">local voices</span>. old and new.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 6 -->
      <div class="bg-purple-200 border-4 border-purple-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-purple-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-green-700 mb-2">
            üí∞ Do I keep my monetization?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-green-600">Yes.</span> FU TV streams content through curated youtube playlists, so creators keep <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-2 py-1 border-2 border-black font-bold">full ownership</span>, views, and monetization from their videos.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 7 -->
      <div class="bg-red-200 border-4 border-red-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-red-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-cyan-600 mb-2">
            üé® Can I customize my own FU TV page?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-blue-600">Yes.</span> Every visitor can create their own version of the FU TV site. You can start from scratch, make files, and customize your personal page to explore and organize the website your own way.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 8 -->
      <div class="bg-teal-200 border-4 border-teal-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-teal-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-orange-600 mb-2">
            üí° Can I suggest changes or features for the website?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-purple-600">Sure.</span> In the submissions you can also include suggestions for what you'd like to see added or improved on the site. <span class="bg-pink-300 px-2 border-2 border-black">May or may not happen</span> but can't hurt.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 9 -->
      <div class="bg-indigo-200 border-4 border-indigo-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-indigo-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-600 mb-2">
            üéÆ Are there other features besides videos?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-red-600">Yes.</span> FU TV also includes <span class="bg-lime-300 px-2 border-2 border-black font-bold">games</span> and other stuff.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 10 -->
      <div class="bg-fuchsia-200 border-4 border-fuchsia-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-fuchsia-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-700 mb-2">
            üì∫ How do I watch?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            Click the <span class="bg-cyan-400 px-3 py-1 border-4 border-black font-bold text-xl animate-pulse">Tubestream Tab</span>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Final Question - EXTRA LOUD -->
      <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-red-400 via-yellow-400 to-pink-400 border-8 border-black p-5 shadow-2xl animate-pulse">
        <div class="bg-white border-4 border-dashed border-black p-4">
          <h3 class="text-3xl font-bold text-red-600 mb-3 text-center">
            ‚ö° WHAT IF I HAVE MORE QUESTIONS?! ‚ö°
          </h3>
          <p class="text-xl text-black leading-relaxed text-center font-bold">
            Submit questions in the <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-3 py-2 border-4 border-black text-2xl">mail section</span> with everything else
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

    </div>

    <!-- Footer with Spinning Stars -->
    <div class="mt-8 bg-black border-4 border-yellow-400 p-6 shadow-2xl">
      <div class="text-center">
        <p class="text-3xl font-bold text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-400 via-yellow-400 to-cyan-400 mb-3">
          üåü Still Confused? That's OK! üåü
        </p>
        <div class="flex justify-center gap-3 text-3xl">
          <span class="animate-spin">‚≠ê</span>
          <span class="animate-bounce">üì∫</span>
          <span class="animate-pulse">üéÆ</span>
          <span class="animate-bounce">üé¨</span>
          <span class="animate-spin">‚ú®</span>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Counter Badge -->
    <div class="text-center mt-4">
      <div class="inline-block bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-purple-600 border-4 border-white px-6 py-3 shadow-xl">
        <p class="text-white text-sm font-bold">
          üèÜ YOU ARE VISITOR #420,069 üèÜ
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>

  </div>
</div>

customAppData.html_content:
‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÖ ABOUT FU TV ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÖ

üé¨ Welcome to FU TV! üé¨

FU TV is a Vancouver-based online station and website that curates and produces local content. We showcase independent videos, films, music videos, and art made in and around Vancouver.

üíæ

>>> For Creators <<<

Creators keep full ownership, views, and monetization from their work ‚Äî FU TV simply curates and streams it as part of our public playlist. You can submit your own content, watch what others are making in town, and be part of a growing lineup of Vancouver creators.

‚ú® What's Inside? ‚ú®

The station also features mini games, original FU TV productions and upcoming interactive updates designed to make local media fun, weird, and accessible.

‚ù§Ô∏è Made with Love in Vancouver üá®üá¶

<div class="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-400 via-pink-300 to-yellow-300 p-4">
  <!-- Animated Sparkly Header -->
  <div class="max-w-5xl mx-auto">
    
    <!-- Title Banner with Extreme Y2K Energy -->
    <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 via-yellow-400 to-lime-400 border-8 border-double border-black p-6 mb-6 shadow-2xl transform hover:scale-105 transition-transform">
      <h1 class="text-6xl font-bold text-center text-white drop-shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,0,0,0.8)] animate-pulse">
        ‚≠ê FU TV - FAQ ‚≠ê
      </h1>
      <p class="text-center text-2xl text-black font-bold mt-2 bg-yellow-300 inline-block w-full py-2 border-4 border-black">
        ~~~ FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS ~~~
      </p>
    </div>

    <!-- FAQ Container with Classic Frames -->
    <div class="space-y-4">
      
      <!-- Question 1 -->
      <div class="bg-cyan-200 border-4 border-blue-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-blue-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-red-600 mb-2">
            ‚ùì What is FU TV?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            FU TV is a <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-2 border-2 border-black font-bold">Vancouver-based</span> online tv station (website) that curates and produces local content ‚Äî including shows, music videos, short films, and art made in and around Vancouver.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 2 -->
      <div class="bg-lime-200 border-4 border-green-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-green-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-purple-600 mb-2">
            üë§ Who runs FU TV?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            FU TV is curated by <span class="text-blue-600 font-bold text-xl">James LeBuke</span>. He also works with <span class="bg-pink-300 px-2 border-2 border-black">Faliureunit Productions</span>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 3 -->
      <div class="bg-pink-200 border-4 border-pink-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-pink-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-green-600 mb-2">
            üì§ Can I submit my own content?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-green-600">Yes.</span> Anyone in or connected to Vancouver can submit their work to possibly be featured on FU TV.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 4 -->
      <div class="bg-yellow-200 border-4 border-yellow-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-yellow-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-red-600 mb-2">
            ü§î Will it for sure make it on:
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-red-600">No.</span> but <span class="bg-lime-300 px-2 py-1 border-2 border-black text-xl">maybe</span>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 5 -->
      <div class="bg-orange-200 border-4 border-orange-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-orange-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-600 mb-2">
            üé¨ What kind of content do you feature?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-purple-600 font-bold">Everything</span> with a focus on <span class="bg-pink-300 px-1 border border-black">creative</span>, <span class="bg-cyan-300 px-1 border border-black">original</span>, and <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-1 border border-black">local voices</span>. old and new.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 6 -->
      <div class="bg-purple-200 border-4 border-purple-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-purple-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-green-700 mb-2">
            üí∞ Do I keep my monetization?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-green-600">Yes.</span> FU TV streams content through curated youtube playlists, so creators keep <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-2 py-1 border-2 border-black font-bold">full ownership</span>, views, and monetization from their videos.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 7 -->
      <div class="bg-red-200 border-4 border-red-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-red-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-cyan-600 mb-2">
            üé® Can I customize my own FU TV page?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-blue-600">Yes.</span> Every visitor can create their own version of the FU TV site. You can start from scratch, make files, and customize your personal page to explore and organize the website your own way.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 8 -->
      <div class="bg-teal-200 border-4 border-teal-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-teal-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-orange-600 mb-2">
            üí° Can I suggest changes or features for the website?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-purple-600">Sure.</span> In the submissions you can also include suggestions for what you'd like to see added or improved on the site. <span class="bg-pink-300 px-2 border-2 border-black">May or may not happen</span> but can't hurt.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 9 -->
      <div class="bg-indigo-200 border-4 border-indigo-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-indigo-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-pink-600 mb-2">
            üéÆ Are there other features besides videos?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            <span class="text-3xl font-bold text-red-600">Yes.</span> FU TV also includes <span class="bg-lime-300 px-2 border-2 border-black font-bold">games</span> and other stuff.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Question 10 -->
      <div class="bg-fuchsia-200 border-4 border-fuchsia-600 p-5 shadow-xl">
        <div class="bg-white border-2 border-dashed border-fuchsia-600 p-4">
          <h3 class="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-700 mb-2">
            üì∫ How do I watch?
          </h3>
          <p class="text-lg text-black leading-relaxed">
            Click the <span class="bg-cyan-400 px-3 py-1 border-4 border-black font-bold text-xl animate-pulse">Tubestream Tab</span>.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Final Question - EXTRA LOUD -->
      <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-red-400 via-yellow-400 to-pink-400 border-8 border-black p-5 shadow-2xl animate-pulse">
        <div class="bg-white border-4 border-dashed border-black p-4">
          <h3 class="text-3xl font-bold text-red-600 mb-3 text-center">
            ‚ö° WHAT IF I HAVE MORE QUESTIONS?! ‚ö°
          </h3>
          <p class="text-xl text-black leading-relaxed text-center font-bold">
            Submit questions in the <span class="bg-yellow-300 px-3 py-2 border-4 border-black text-2xl">mail section</span> with everything else
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>

    </div>

        <p class="text-3xl font-bold text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-400 via-yellow-400 to-cyan-400 mb-3">
